content.text: 1 (10 inch) angel food cake, cut into large cubes
content.eamr: ( ing-0 "1 (10 inch) angel food cake, cut into large cubes" )
( ing-1 "1 (5 ounce) can sweetened condensed milk" )

content.text: 0) Toast the angel food cake cubes over the coals of a campfire on toasting sticks until browned.
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "Toast"@3:8 / AC
		:loc ( tool-0-0 "toasting sticks"@67:82 / TOOL )
		:until ( cond-0-0 "until browned"@83:96 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:ppt ( ing-0 "the angel food cake cubes"@9:34 / FOOD )
		:instrument ( tool-0-1 "the coals of a campfire"@40:63 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 1) Dip the toasted cake into the condensed milk, and roll in coconut flakes.
